page.title: 08Kirkby Police Station
page.content: Kirkby Police are part of the Merseyside Police Force. Most patrols in the area travel in Panda cars although the force do have some fast pursuit cars. The police station consists of an inquiry desk and a general office area. In one of the office's is a four minute warning siren in case of nuclear attack. The senior officers have their rooms in the upper floors. Down below are the cells where people who have been arrested will be fingerprinted. They then spent the night there while waiting for their case to be heard at the Magistrates court nearby.
